attributes.action: permit a petition to petition for a general election to be held immediately.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To refuse such a petition in the current circumstances seems defensive.

rejection.details: There already is such a petition: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/GoToCountryNow/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
